title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Hi, my name is Amanda and I am seeking a virtual assistant with experience in creating product listings for online selling platforms such as Ebay, Poshmark, and Mercari for my reselling business (primarily clothing, shoes, purses).

VA will use the cross listing software "List Perfectly"  to create listings from the photos of the products that I provide. I will train how to use this software if unfamiliar. 

If interested, please reply with the words "List Perfectly" in subject. 

Thank you,
Amanda
